meanings.sent3: The encoding of the secret message made it look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an encoding of happiness that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The encoding of the melody in the music sheet was clear and easy to follow.

meanings.definition: The act of assigning a code to something for the purpose of classification or identification.
meanings.sent1: The encoding of products with barcodes simplifies inventory management.
meanings.sent2: The encoding of student IDs helps in tracking attendance.
meanings.sent3: The encoding of the treasure map added a fun twist to the adventure.
